data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Komárom-Esztergom, Hungary, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Komárom-Esztergom, Hungary
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 9,624 believers in Komárom-Esztergom, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 9,624 believers find a person of peace today among the 305,376 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Komárom-Esztergom.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Bosniak people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, you gave the church of Komárom-Esztergom, Hungary the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Komárom-Esztergom, Hungary to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Komárom-Esztergom, Hungary has a population of 315,000.

We estimate Komárom-Esztergom has 9,624 people who might know Jesus, 264,533 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 40,843 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 264,533 people in the state of Komárom-Esztergom who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
